name: Merry Mayday
description:
Do you desire some festive fun?

Christmas is in danger! Santa has fallen, and it is your job as his magic sack to save Christmas. Catch the falling presents and dodge any plummeting explosives to achieve the highest score possible! Play through 12 unique levels in this one of a kind gameplay experience! Want to see more games like this? Be sure to check out our YouTube and give us feedback!
